type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Has Item Cooldown

---

Checks if the player has an item cooldown.

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "moborigins:has_item_cooldown",
    "item": "minecraft:iron_sword"
}
```
Checks if the player has an item cooldown for iron swords.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Has Item Cooldown

---

Checks if the player has an item cooldown.

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "moborigins:has_item_cooldown",
    "item": "minecraft:iron_sword"
}
```
Checks if the player has an item cooldown for iron swords.

item.description: The item to set the cooldown of.
item.markdownDescription: The item to set the cooldown of.

hand.description: The hand to check for an item to set the cooldown of, if set, will ignore the item parameter. Valid values are `MAIN_HAND` and `OFF_HAND`.
hand.markdownDescription: The hand to check for an item to set the cooldown of, if set, will ignore the item parameter. Valid values are `MAIN_HAND` and `OFF_HAND`.

x-intellij-html-description:
Has Item Cooldown

Checks if the player has an item cooldown.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
item Item Optional The item to set the cooldown of.
hand Hand Optional The hand to check for an item to set the cooldown of, if set, will ignore the item parameter. Valid values are MAIN_HAND and OFF_HAND.

Example

{
    "type": "moborigins:has_item_cooldown",
    "item": "minecraft:iron_sword"
}

Checks if the player has an item cooldown for iron swords.
